columns:
id                            uuid                NOT NULL   DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()    PK
    component_id                  uuid                NOT NULL      FK → machine_components(id)
    performed_by                  uuid                NOT NULL      FK → users(id)
    calibration_type              text                NOT NULL  
    previous_values               jsonb               NOT NULL  
    new_values                    jsonb               NOT NULL  
    performed_at                  timestamp with time NOT NULL   DEFAULT now()
    next_calibration_date         timestamp with time NOT NULL  
    notes                         text                NULL      
    created_at                    timestamp with time NOT NULL   DEFAULT now()

id                            uuid                NOT NULL   DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4()    PK

    min_value                     double precision    NOT NULL
